hero.headline: Responsive web templates tailored to your clients
hero.description: Pre-built sections and components help you deliver a customized draft as soon as an order comes in. Speed up your projects with a consistent design system and reusable pieces.

highlights.title: Why teams rely on us
highlights.subtitle: We pre-build the sections and flows you need most often so you can adapt them quickly to every project.

responsive.title: Responsive grid system
responsive.description: Tailwind CSS utilities deliver pixel-perfect layouts on every screen size.

branding.title: Brand-friendly design
branding.description: Adjust colors, typography, and components to reflect each brand identity in minutes.

templates.title: Ready-to-ship pages
templates.description: Home, services, product, and portfolio pages prebuilt for rapid delivery.

workflow.title: 3-step delivery workflow
workflow.description: Most drafts ship within two days thanks to our streamlined, template-driven process.

steps.title: Select template & gather brand assets
steps.description: Match the client use case, then collect brand colors, logo, and tone of voice.

steps.title: Assemble sections & customize
steps.description: Compose hero, services, CTAs, and visuals to align with the brand narrative.

steps.title: QA & handoff
steps.description: Run responsive and accessibility checks, capture revisions, and prepare delivery.

testimonials.title: Feedback from partners
testimonials.subtitle: Studios and freelancers use these templates to accelerate delivery without sacrificing quality.

items.name: Kim Pro
items.quote: With pre-built templates we recreate the client’s desired flow in half a day. Customizing details is effortless, and satisfaction is high.

items.name: Lee Designer
items.quote: The grid and components are so well organized that my turnaround time doubled. Mobile responsiveness works from the start.

items.name: Park Dev
items.quote: Vite + React keeps builds fast, and Tailwind ensures consistent styling, making maintenance easy.

service.title: Service overview template
service.description: Perfect for agencies and professional services. Put pricing, FAQs, and core value propositions in front of your clients instantly.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Ideal when you need to highlight a clear service process and build trust—consulting, marketing, education, and more.

product.title: Product landing template
product.description: A flexible structure for SaaS, digital goods, and courses. Showcase features, benefits, and pricing clearly.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Best suited for SaaS startups, subscription services, and online education that need to explain product value quickly.

portfolio.title: Portfolio showcase template
portfolio.description: Designed for freelancers, studios, and creators. Present your best work, process, and client feedback in a cohesive story.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Great for design studios, personal portfolios, and media teams that need to emphasize visual references.

footer.description: Deliver high-quality templates immediately and share rapid drafts with your clients.

components.title: UI Component Library
components.description: Browse and test the common UI components used throughout the project.

badges.title: Badge Components
badges.description: Badges for displaying status or categories.

forms.title: Form Components
forms.description: Components for user input and forms.

dataDisplay.title: Data Display Components
dataDisplay.description: Components for displaying data and information.
dataDisplay.name: Name
dataDisplay.accordionContent1: This is the content of the first accordion item.
dataDisplay.accordionContent2: This is the content of the second accordion item.
dataDisplay.tab1Content: This is the content of the first tab.
dataDisplay.tab2Content: This is the content of the second tab.

feedback.title: Feedback Components
feedback.description: Components for providing user feedback and interactions.
feedback.alertDescription: This is a default alert message.
